name: Mango
0:
”Alexa open mango news”
”Alexa start mango news”
”Alexa ask mango news to read articles from New York Times”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mango news
des:
Mango news helps you search and read news from your favorite publishers, digest the news interactively and efficiently. 

Impatient about the traditional lengthy news articles? Just ask the skill to skip, it enables you digest and focus on the news you care about, the news at your control.

It supports over 40 mainstream news sources, like New York Times, CNN, Washington Post, Reuters, ABC, ESPN, Business Insider, TechCrunch and etc.

To quickly start, just say:
"get my headlines"

To digest the headlines from a source, you can say:
"get headlines from New York Times"

For categories, you can try out:
"read the business news"

If you just want to surface up the specific topic, try:
"read headlines about Elon Musk"

With more features to come.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
